name: PANCYPRIAN FEDERATION OF LABOUR
goal:
Support and fight for working class rights
Create collective aggrements at the workplaces
Participate at the national tripart dialogue
Promote working laws
Provide various services to the members such as medical, legal and welfare services etc.
interests: Communication, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: Participate at the tripart dialogue for implementing the EU directives and  policies  at the national legislation. Raise awareness on EU policies and legislation
